Hi,

>    One thing I missed to write,that I am using Window verion of
> heritrix.

I've just discovered that the order in which the jar files are loaded was
wrong in the current heritrix script for windows. That's fixed in the one
I uploaded a few minutes ago (see my last post). This could fix your
problem.

Regards,
Max
